posts.title: DME - Data Mining and Exploration(INF11007) Revision
posts.text: Exploratory Data AnalysisNumberical Data DescriptionLocation Not Robust Measure Sample Mean (arithmetic mean or average): $\hat{x} = \frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_{i}$ for random variable: $\mathbb{E}[x] = \int xp(x) dx$ Robust Measure Median: $median(x) = \begin{cases} x_{[(n+1)\mathbin{/}2]}& \text{; if $n$ is odd}\\ \frac{1}{2}[x_{(n\mathbin{/}2)}+x_{(n\mathbin{/}2)+1}]& \text{; if $n$ is even} \end{cases}$ Mode: Value that occurs most frequent $\alpha_{th}$ Sample Quantile (rough data point, i.e. $q_{\alpha} \approx x_{([n\alpha])}$) $Q_{1} = q_{0.25}$, $Q_{2} = q_{0.5}$, $Q_{3} = q_{0.75}$ Example$$Data_1=[0, 1, 1, 1, 2, 3, 4, 4, 5, 9]$$$$Data_2=[0, 1, 1, 1, 2, 3, 4, 4, 5, 9000]$$

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
